Comments_List: From this course I learned different approaches in artificial intelligence, gained skills in probabilistic programming and got to view AI from a game-theoretical point of view.
Game agency strategies including Search, Pruning, MCTS, Neural Network and game theories.
The best course in this semester!
The course is really fun and helpful, but the game involved is too old.
The application setting of this course, strategy games, is very interesting!
Strengths: Very active lectures for everyone to join in the course. Really quick respond to Piazza questions. Interesting course settings for contents and assignments.

Strength: topics nicely layer out and lectures easy to follow

Improvements: maybe the notes posted can be clearer.
Yes. It's very interesting and learns a lot
definitely. this course teaches lots of helpful algorithms that can be applied in many fields, and the game itself is fun
Yes! Learning from a game-theoretical point of view is quite inspiring for us to understand AI concepts.
Yes. Strongly recommend because of it is interesting and gives me both theoretical and practical improvements.
Yes. Covers interesting materials regarding to AI in general.
